divs: sighting detailsi'm not crazy. i am an educated, business professional who owns his own business. i never reported this to anyone, because i was afraid of the ridicule that i knew would come from telling my story, and because my memory surrounding this incident been so unclear. i definitely saw this thing ��� it's image is forever burned into my memory, and i still have nightmares about it, increasingly so, it seems ��� but everything after the initial moment of the sighting remains an absolute blur, including the exact time, date and location. i remember that i was driving with someone ��� my ex-wife, i think, but i honestly don't remember who. i do know that we were southbound on colorado highway 287. the location was a few miles north of the old saw mill, just north of a convenience store called "ted's place." i believe it was somewhere between 5:00 and 7:00 pm, and visibility was excellent. i got a very good look at the thing. i remember coming around a curve in the road and suddenly seeing a shockingly large delta wing or boomerang shaped object in the sky...judging by the landmarks, maybe 1\2 to 3\4 mile at its widest point...hovering above the cliff to my left. i served with the 4th marine aircraft wing, so i have been around all kinds of aircraft...even some classified military aircraft...and i can tell you that it was nothing like anything that i had ever seen before, or since. the closest thing that i have ever seen to this was called the yb-49 flying wing...only this thing was gargantuan and had no sign of an engine of anykind, anywhere, and it made no sound that i could hear...and it was just hanging there, hovering. the ufo had a much more pronounced "v" shape, and no fuselage or tail fins at all. at the time i owned some land in the area, and it frightened me that this occurred so close to my property...virtually, in my backyard. i had hiked all up and down those hills and cliffs in the area, both hunting and photographing wildlife, so i was very familiar with the area. this has haunted me for years, and i would like to know more about it. i am willing to be hypnotized, if it will help me to remember the incident. regards,
